title: Pet population in Europe 2018 , by animal type
summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Pet Type, and Number of pets in thousands in each Pet Type on the y axis.
The maximum Number of pets in thousands 103828.0 is found at Pet Type Cat and the minimum is found at Reptiles where Pet Type is 7848.0.
The difference of Number of pets in thousands between the highest and lowest Pet Type is 95980.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Pet Type in the x axis and Number of pets in thousands in the y axis.
The maximum Number of pets in thousands 103828.0 is found at Pet Type Cat and the minimum is found at Reptiles where Pet Type is 7848.0.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Pet Type in the x axis and Number of pets in thousands in the y axis.
The maximum Number of pets in thousands 103828.0 is found at Pet Type Cat and the minimum is found at Reptiles where Pet Type is 7848.0.
Pet Type Dog has the second highest value for Number of pets in thousands.
The highest Pet Type Cat has 95980.0 more Number of pets in thousands than the lowest Pet Type Reptiles.
Pet Type Cat is higher than any other Pet Types with value 103828.0, followed by Dog, and Ornamental bird. Down to Pet Type Reptiles with the lowest value 7848.0.
Considered together, the average Number of pets in thousands in all 6 Pet Types is roughly 48226.5.
